attributes.action: Make collaborative working truly successfull..before there's another baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time and time again this country fails to safeguard vulnerable children. 
Lord lamings findings, after the Victoria Climbie inquiry uncovered a grossly negligent system, involving the Agencies and Professionals paid to protect them.
Yet despite his proposals for change, and new legislation...we are still no further forward.
Collaborative, multi-agency working is clearly still not happening, because its riddled in too many pitfalls to be truly successfull.
THIS NEEDS TO CHANGE!!
the Prime Minister should leave no stone unturned in looking where these failures are coming from...from the negligence of the professionals, to the organisations they work within, and to the legislation which is letting these children down.
The theory of collaborative working is excellent...but in practise it is seriously failing and we need to know why so that we can stop it.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Procedure/
e-petitions require full name and address information.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
